Stim_eTGc_Desc: A powerful regenerative process enhancer. Used for rapid recovery after injury or during the transport of critically wounded patients. Authorized for use by professional physicians and medical personnel only. Causes severe side effects.
TarkovStimulants_eTGc_Buff_Desc: Extreme health regeneration (20%/s), reduces metabolism consumption by 20% and all elemental damage taken by 10%; enters severe weakness after 20 seconds.
TarkovStimulants_eTGc_Debuff_Desc: Compensatory organ failure: -30 maximum stamina and rapid energy drain.
Stim_SJ12_Desc: Designed for special operations personnel. Temporarily suppresses certain bodily functions to restore stamina. Forces the hypothalamus to secrete vasopressin, altering adrenal activity, lowering body temperature, and enhancing perception.
TarkovStimulants_SJ12_Buff_Desc: Increases detection range by 30% and continuously restores energy and hydration during the effect.
Stim_Propital_Desc: A military drug that stimulates regeneration by increasing the biosynthesis of purine and pyrimidine bases, RNA, and functional enzymatic cellular elements. Enhances metabolism, health, and vitality.
TarkovStimulants_Propital_Buff_Desc: Increases max health by 20, restores 2% HP per second, and reduces metabolism consumption by 10%; side effects cause tremors and tunnel vision.
Stim_SJ6_Desc: A combat stimulant injected before battle to enhance physical capabilities. Authorized for use by special operations units. Developed by TerraGroup Labs and marked SJ6.
TarkovStimulants_SJ6_Buff_Desc: Increases max stamina by 50, boosts stamina recovery speed by 30% and reduces recovery delay by 20%, and increases movement speed by 20%.
Stim_MULE_Desc: Muscle Ultra-Large Enhancer. Used before long marches to expand physical capabilities, allowing the body to carry more weight for extended periods.
TarkovStimulants_MULE_Buff_Desc: Doubles carry weight limit (+100%) at the cost of continuous minor health loss.
Stim_Adrenaline_Desc: A disposable sterile syringe containing a dose of adrenaline. Used to enhance physiological responses and prepare the body for intense muscular activity.
TarkovStimulants_Adrenaline_Buff_Desc: Rapid regeneration for the first 15 seconds (10%/s), +10% firearm damage and stamina recovery; triggers weakness after 50 seconds.
TarkovStimulants_Adrenaline_Debuff_Desc: Physiological decline: increased physical damage taken and rapid energy/hydration loss.
Stim_Meldonin_Desc: Developed for athletes. Helps you recover faster during intensive training. Temporarily increases strength, endurance, and recovery speed.
TarkovStimulants_Meldonin_Buff_Desc: Increases max stamina by 20, boosts stamina recovery speed and melee damage by 20%, and increases mobility by 30%. Side effect: accelerated energy and hydration loss.
Stim_Morphine_Desc: A disposable syringe filled with a high dose of morphine, primarily used to treat severe acute and chronic pain.
TarkovStimulants_Morphine_Buff_Desc: Long-lasting pain relief and prevention of fractures and trauma states.
Stim_L1_Desc: A disposable sterile syringe containing L1, primarily norepinephrine. Used for short-term boosts to strength and endurance.
TarkovStimulants_L1_Buff_Desc: Increases max stamina by 20, boosts stamina recovery speed and firearm damage by 20%, with significant metabolic strain.
Stim_3bTG_Desc: A combat drug that stimulates the central nervous system, increasing perception and attention.
TarkovStimulants_3bTG_Buff_Desc: Increases detection range by 50%, boosts firearm damage and stamina recovery by 10%, greatly increases fishing luck; triggers side effects after 120 seconds.
Stim_Perfotoran_Desc: A blood substitute capable of transporting oxygen, used as a super antidote for poisoning and radiation.
TarkovStimulants_Perfotoran_Buff_Desc: Continuous regeneration (4%/s), removes bleeding and grants short-term poison immunity.
Stim_2A2bTG_Desc: A new TerraGroup product following 3-(b-TG). Designed to provide enhanced combat support.
TarkovStimulants_2A2bTG_Buff_Desc: Increases carry weight limit by 15% and detection range by 10%, significantly improves fishing efficiency.
Stim_P22_Desc: A combat stimulant that passively reinforces internal muscles, reducing tissue damage.
TarkovStimulants_P22_Buff_Desc: Grants physical damage reduction and +40 max health; reduces max stamina by 20 and stamina recovery speed by 20%.
Stim_Obdolbos2_Desc: A new version of Sanitar's homemade drug, containing multiple extreme physiological stimulants.
TarkovStimulants_Obdolbos2_Buff_Desc: Carry weight +60%, movement speed +50%, greatly increased damage and enhanced fishing luck; at the cost of continuous health drain and stamina penalties.
Stim_Trimadol_Desc: An opioid analgesic that not only relieves pain but also enhances combat capability.
TarkovStimulants_Trimadol_Buff_Desc: Overdrive: doubles stamina recovery speed, +30% movement speed, +20 stamina, and halves stamina recovery delay. Side effect: rapid energy and hydration loss.
Stim_SJ1_Desc: Injected before combat to gain strength and endurance. Developed by TerraGroup Labs.
TarkovStimulants_SJ1_Buff_Desc: Greatly increases firearm damage by 30%, +20% movement speed, minor physical damage reduction, and metabolic strain.
Stim_Zagustin_Desc: A military drug that temporarily stops bleeding and increases bleeding resistance. Causes severe dehydration as a side effect.
TarkovStimulants_Zagustin_Buff_Desc: Grants bleeding immunity and +25 max health; significantly increases hydration consumption during effect.
Stim_SJ9_Desc: Temporarily lowers body temperature and slows metabolism, making the user nearly invisible to thermal imaging.
TarkovStimulants_SJ9_Buff_Desc: "Cold-Blooded" state: detection distance reduced by 50% and metabolism consumption reduced by 30%, at the cost of gradual health drain.
Stim_AHF1M_Desc: A military drug based on human anti-hemophilic factor. A powerful coagulant that temporarily stops bleeding and increases resistance to bleeding. Causes dehydration during effect.
TarkovStimulants_AHF1M_Buff_Desc: Grants 90 seconds of bleeding immunity and instantly removes all bleeding effects. Reduces hydration after use.
Stim_Obdolbos_Desc: A syringe filled with homemade drugs created by a former TerraGroup Labs employee. Its complex composition causes extremely unstable physiological reactions.
TarkovStimulants_Obdolbos_Buff_Desc: Chaotic biochemical reaction: each bonus (mobility, firepower, luck, damage reduction) has an independent 25% chance to trigger, with a 25% chance of instant death.
Stim_PNB_Desc: A combat stimulant codenamed PNB. Temporarily activates internal muscles into a high-permeability state, greatly enhancing explosive power and regeneration. Causes weakness after effect ends.
TarkovStimulants_PNB_Buff_Desc: Burst phase: +30% firearm damage and restores 8% HP per second; triggers weakness after 35 seconds (-15 max health).
TarkovStimulants_PNB_Debuff_Desc: Muscle fatigue: temporarily reduces max health by 15.
Stim_xTG12_Desc: Neutralizes most known toxins used in warfare. Grants toxin immunity but slightly reduces health indicators.
TarkovStimulants_xTG12_Buff_Desc: Antitoxin state: grants 60 seconds of poison resistance and instantly removes all poison effects.
Stim_SJ15_Desc: A top-tier military combat drug that pushes the body to its absolute limits, granting unparalleled mobility, carry capacity, and regeneration. A last resortâ€”side effects are often fatal.
TarkovStimulants_SJ15_Buff_Desc: War God Mode: +50 max health and stamina, +50% movement speed and carry weight, rapid regeneration and immunity to bleeding/poison. 50% chance of sudden death before effect ends.
Stim_ObdolbosN_Desc: An improved model of Obdolbos, codenamed "N." Focuses on enhancing charisma and negotiation ability, but retains extreme biochemical instability.
TarkovStimulants_ObdolbosN_Buff_Desc: Commercial Fraud: greatly increases charisma and significantly improves trader prices. Warning: 25% chance of sudden death due to organ failure.
TarkovStimulants_Tremor_Debuff_Desc: Physiological instability: +30% weapon spread and -30% recoil control.
TarkovStimulants_TunnelVision_Debuff_Des: Restricted vision: field of view reduced by 70%.
TarkovStimulants_InstantDeath_Debuff_Des: Organ failure: health rapidly drops to zero.
